net.sf.jclal.listener

Class GraphicalReporterListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.listener.ClassicalReporterListener
      • net.sf.jclal.listener.GraphicalReporterListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithmListener, IConfigure, JCLAL

    public class GraphicalReporterListener
extends ClassicalReporterListener
implements IConfigure
    This class is a listener for a graphical reporter
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void algorithmFinished(AlgorithmEvent event)
      It is executed when the experiment finishes, counts with the date of completion of the algorithm.
      void algorithmStarted(AlgorithmEvent event)
      Is executed after the algorithm begins, prepares the conditions of the report: in case of requesting report in file, it creates and keeps the basic configuration of the experiment, show visual report.

      void iterationCompleted(AlgorithmEvent event)
      Is executed whenever the algorithm completes an iteration of active learning, in this case the evaluation of the above mentioned iteration is had, it is possible to store in file or to show it for console or show in a window.

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class ClassicalReporterListener
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration object for the Graphical Reporter Listener. The XML labels supported are:
        • show-window= boolean
        • show-passive-learning= boolean

      • algorithmStarted

        public void algorithmStarted(AlgorithmEvent event)
        Is executed after the algorithm begins, prepares the conditions of the report: in case of requesting report in file, it creates and keeps the basic configuration of the experiment, show visual report.
        Specified by:
        algorithmStarted in interface IAlgorithmListener
        Overrides:
        algorithmStarted in class ClassicalReporterListener
        Parameters:
        event - The event over the algorithm

      • iterationCompleted

        public void iterationCompleted(AlgorithmEvent event)
        Is executed whenever the algorithm completes an iteration of active learning, in this case the evaluation of the above mentioned iteration is had, it is possible to store in file or to show it for console or show in a window.
        Specified by:
        iterationCompleted in interface IAlgorithmListener
        Overrides:
        iterationCompleted in class ClassicalReporterListener
        Parameters:
        event - The event over the algorithm

      • algorithmFinished

        public void algorithmFinished(AlgorithmEvent event)
        It is executed when the experiment finishes, counts with the date of completion of the algorithm.
        Specified by:
        algorithmFinished in interface IAlgorithmListener
        Overrides:
        algorithmFinished in class ClassicalReporterListener
        Parameters:
